pages.text: Indeed, this was not the result I expected. It seems in absence of a target, the teleportation effect remains suspended in the Crucible until one ventures close enough.

I wonder if it might be possible to somehow $(4)capture this effect$(0)? If it were, I could probably use it for quite a few interesting purposes. Before I could do so, however, I would have to be able to get close without being transported myself. This is truly a mystery...
